meta_description: The National Constitution Center serves as America's leading platform for constitutional education and debate.
collections_text:
#### At the Museum

Experience the Constitution through rare artifacts, historic documents, interactive galleries, and live programming.

[Plan Your Visit](/web/20260116234341/https://constitutioncenter.org/museum/visit)

###### Temporarily Closed

##### [The First Amendment](/web/20260116234341/https://constitutioncenter.org/museum/exhibits-programs/the-first-amendment)

The Center's newest gallery offers a fresh perspective on the history of the First Amendment and how it impacts us today.

###### Virtual Tour

##### [Signers’ Hall](/web/20260116234341/https://constitutioncenter.org/museum/exhibits-programs/signers-hall)

Signers’ Hall invites you to sign the Constitution alongside 42 life-size, bronze statues of the Founding Fathers.
